name: container_1
description: the jar file location of the original project

name: container_2
description: the jar file location of the mutated project

name: class_1
description: path of the original class file in container_1

name: class_2
description: path of the mutated class file in container_2; will have the form '/path/to/SomeClass-<n>.class', where <n> is the mutation number for this class

name: description
description: description of the specific mutation applied

name: line
description: line number where the mutation was applied

name: method_descriptor
description: descriptor of the method where the mutation was applied

name: method_name
description: name of the method where the mutation was applied

name: mutator
description: name of the Pitest mutator that applied the mutation
